sentences.sContent: The whole stadium stink of the hamburger.
sentences.sCn: 整个体育场内散发着汉堡包的香味。

sentences.sContent: Avoid unhealthy foods such as hamburger and chips.
sentences.sCn: 不要吃不健康食品，如汉堡和薯条。

synos.tran: 汉堡包，汉堡；牛肉饼，肉饼；碎牛肉

trans.tranOther: a flat round piece of finely cut beef which is cooked and eaten in a bread bun
